DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of 'Shinbaro Capsule', a new herbal anti-arthritic agent, in patients with osteoarthritis of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Shinbaro Capsule
DOC.criteria: age between 35 and 80 diagnosed with Knee OA based on criteria of ACR and showed ont through I ~ III of Kellgren Stage on radiography wuffered constantly with Knee OA for more than 6 months prior to begining the study scored more than 30 on total WOMAC scale had other comorbid orthopedic disease had OA of index knee from significant trauma or surgery
